This blog is about cyber security and risk management. Blog posts will be published in a loose series.

The following tools were used to create this blog:

-   Quarto (open source publishing system)
-   RStudio for web authoring
-   GitHub for version control
-   Netlify for web hosting

The initial setup took place on June 2, 2023
